mapper.select: SELECT ci.car_info_id, info.model_name, info.manufacture_year, info.mileage, info.transmission, info.car_price, info.fuel_type FROM wishlist w JOIN car_information ci ON w.car_info_id = ci.car_info_id LEFT JOIN information info ON ci.car_info_id = info.car_info_id WHERE w.user_id = #{userId} AND ci.is_deleted = false AND info.is_deleted = false ORDER BY w.wishlist_id DESC
